inclusion.criterion: s/p ACL reconstruction within the last three months prior to initiation of study training
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: s/p knee arthroscopy within the last 2 weeks prior to initiation of study training
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: S/p lower extremity trauma, unilateral with thigh weakness of at least a 20% deficit compared to contralateral side and at least 6 months out from most recent trauma or surgery
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Fluent in English and able to consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contralateral lower extremity involvement resulting in less than normal range of motion, muscle strength, or daily pain greater than 5/10.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Recent history of deep vein thrombosis, within the 12 months or on active treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of endothelial dysfunction, peripheral vascular disease, hypertension, diabetes, or people prone to capillary ruptures (bruising) (determined by verbal reporting by the patient)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently undergoing treatment, which may make them ineligible for the study.
